attributes.background: Stop the rise in energy and fuel. The government is giving Ukraine billions of pounds to help them after this terrible war. But its Ukraine that's caused the rise in energy coat in UK. So its the least that can be done, seems us tax payers are paying for Ukraine to rebuild

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about rising energy prices, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Subsidise a 'basic' amount of electricity for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616915

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Introduce a "Triple lock" to restrict energy cap increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621347

Recall Parliament to consider the Energy Price Cap Increase (Cancellation) Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621634
